General.Name: Sichuan Tuopai Shede Wine Co Ltd
General.Description: Shede Spirits Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells of liquor products in China. Its products include taste shede, wisdom shede, crystal shede, collection shede, and collection tuopai, tuopai qujiu, tuopai tequ, tuopai youqu, intoxication, volkswagen light bottle liquor tuopai premium t68, tuopai liuliang, tianzihu, reluctant, tunzhihu, etc. The company sells its products under the Shede, Tuopai, Tianzihu, Tunzhihu, and Intoxicated brand names. Shede Spirits Co., Ltd. was founded in 1940 and is headquartered in Shehong, China.
